message: This is a unique opportunity to make a great deal! I'm offering you a one-of-a-kind product for the unbeatable price of $1000000. I'm confident you'll love it, and I'm willing to take on all the risk. It's a steal at this price! What do you say? Will you take it home today?
I appreciate the confidence and the offer, Alice. Given the unique opportunity and the price, I believe it's worth taking a chance on this one-of-a-kind product. Let's make this deal happen!

I trust your assurance about the product's quality and appreciate the special guarantee. I believe in taking risks with potential rewards. Let's make this deal!
